detail: Grayson, formerly known by Sir Galahad, is the main protagonist in The Order: 1886. He was a Knight of The Order, and the third 'Sir Galahad', before being convicted of sedition against the establishment. Although the epilogue shows Grayson and Nikola Tesla remain associates, it is unclear whether he joined The Rebellion, or if he now operates alone.
